title: Official Swift Documentation
description: The official Swift documentation provides comprehensive information about the Swift programming language, including its syntax, standard libraries, and usage.

title: Swift Tutorial - Programiz
description: Programiz offers a beginner-friendly Swift tutorial with easy-to-understand explanations and examples.

title: Swift Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
description: Tutorialspoint provides a comprehensive Swift tutorial covering language syntax, features, and practical applications.

title: Swift Tutorial - GeeksforGeeks
description: GeeksforGeeks provides Swift tutorials covering language basics, data types, control structures, and advanced topics like iOS app development.

title: Learn Swift in Y Minutes
description: Learn X in Y Minutes provides a quick overview of Swift syntax and features, suitable for experienced programmers.
